version_description: • A feedback form is now integrated in the app. Shape the future of this project by submitting a suggestion and unlock exclusive UI theme.

After almost a year since the last update I'm very happy to announce a release of the new version with a great new features:
• iPads support. EE Helper is now a universal app and works great both on iPhones and iPads.
• An updated Datasheet Search tool. The most popular tool is now even better with refined design, fixed crashes, and additional datasheet providers.

Features:
• Updated Pinouts Guide. Added Arduino Uno R3, Mega 2560 R3, Micro and Zero pinouts.
• New Community platform. Share your feedback about EE Helper using the build-in forum. Thanks to all who submitted their feedback using the previous form. Ruby theme is now available for everyone.

Fixes:
• Fixed crash during DVI-I pinout selection.

New features
• App is now available in Russian and Ukrainian. You can select preferred language in Application Language menu.

Changes
• Zoom in/out buttons at pinout view are now located at the right of navigation bar.

Fixes
• Topic comments were clipped to 1 line.
• Superscript numbers (like 2 in 10^2) had improper alignment.

Thanks for using Electronics Engineer Helper.

• New pinouts: Raspberry Pi 3 Model B, 2 Model B, 1 Model B+, 1 Model A+, Zero.
• New multi-column layout of pins descriptions on iPads.
• Better number presentation at AWG Converter.
• Added background image at right placeholder section of Tools list on iPads.
• Fixed several memory leaks.
• Fixed redundant storage of downloaded datasheets in apps cache folder.
• Fixed crash at Ohm's law calculator during attempt to show not a numeric result.
• Red shades in ruby theme were made less bright.

• Optimizations and fixes for iOS 11.
• Resistor color code tool now also calculates resistance tolerance.
• Datasheets that were added to library can now be also accessed via Files app on iOS 11.
• Added labels near pins of Raspberry Pi pinouts.

• Added electronic schematic symbols reference tool. Provides a list of graphical symbols from IEC 60617, IEE 315 and GOST standards.
• New pinouts: ATX power connectors as well as Thunderbolt 1, 2, 3.
• Bug fixes

This update brings four new tools as well as minor bug fixes:
• Resistor for LED calculator. Useful in those cases when you need to calculate a resistor value for powering one or several LEDs from a constant voltage source.
• Voltage divider. Not only this tool calculates output voltage for given input voltage and resistances, but it also can calculate different combinations of resistances for given input and output voltages and resistance series.
• Capacitor code. Helps to find out capacitor value, tolerance, working voltage and temperature range.
• Capacitor markings reference. Manufacturers often use different approaches in capacitor marking. This tool will introduce you to common examples of capacitor markings.
Thank you for keep using this app. If you enjoy it, please rate it and leave a review.

This update brings minor tool enhancements and bug fixes:
• iOS 12 support.
• New pinouts: Apple Lightning and 30 pin, and RS-232/422/485.
• New and more intuitive color selection input for Resistor color code tool.
• Capacitor ESR tables.
• Fixed crash in Voltage divider tool.
Thank you for keep using this app. If you enjoy it, please rate it and leave a review.

This updated introduces two new tools under the PRO subscription:
• SMD components marking codes.
• Diode color marking code (according to Pro Electron, JEDEC and JIS-C-7012 standards).
Besides that, a new less vibrant theme has been added under the name “Graphite”. The app is now also available in German.
Have wonderful holidays and a great 2019!

This minor update brings following improvements:
• Added colors descriptions at resistor, inductor and diode marking tools.
• Added TRS (Audio Jack), RCA, MIDI and XLR pinouts.
• Added one-time payment option to purchase the PRO version.
• Other small bug fixes.
Big thanks to all 70 users who subscribed to the app's PRO version, your support helps to make this app even better. If you like this app, please rate it and leave a review.
Regards,
Rostyslav

This update brings following improvements:
• [PRO] Linear voltage regulator calculator.
• [PRO] Resistor value to marking converter.
• Linear constant current calculator.
• Updated capacitor ESR tables.
• Updated code input control at SMD resistors tool.
• Minor updates of passive filters tool.
• Added small tool tip at LED resistor tool.
• Fixed issue that caused wrong type of decimal separator to be shown on numeric keyboards.
Big thanks to all 110 users who either subscribed or purchased the app's PRO version since the last update. Your support helps to make this app even better. If you like this app, please rate it and leave a review.
Regards,
Rostyslav

本次更新带来了如下改进:
• 增加了在欧姆定律计算器中使用中间计算结果的功能
• 增加了低通和高通RLC 滤波器
• 增加了 Orange Pi, One, PC, Zero 和 Zero Plus 的引脚分布
• 在点击图中相应区域后,引脚的说明会高亮显示
感谢在上次更新后购买或订阅了PRO版本的124位用户。您的支持会帮助让我们变得更好。如果您喜欢我们的APP,请帮我们评分,留下您的评论。
祝好,
Rostyslav

• [PRO] 添加了串联或并联连接计算器。
• 添加了 Arduino Nano 和 RJ45 引脚。
非常感谢自上次更新以来订阅或购买 PRO 版本应用的所有 220 名用户。您的支持会帮助这款应用变得更好。如果您喜欢此款应用，请给其评分并留下评论。

这是可以在iOS 11上运行的最新版本。要获取将来的更新，请将您的设备更新到iOS 12。

• 更新了LED用电阻器工具。该工具现在除了显示电阻值外，还显示电阻的颜色代码。
